::Feline::

She cringes as Iron Raptor went to put her hand on her shoulder.  She 
then showeda slight sign of releif.  She relaxed her body just a 
bit.  She watched as Iron Raptor turned towards Prowl and tighened up 
again.  She looked into Iron Raptors eyes and gave a weak smile.

She siad in a whisper,"My help?  You ...need ..me?"  

She took a few timid steps closer to the holoprojector and looked at 
the images on it.  She turned to lok at Prowl.  She looked at him and 
gave him an unsure look. She showed fear towards the bigger male.  

She turned and looked at the images again. She shook her head.  "I 
have never heard of nor seen these bots before." She sighed, "I'm so 
very sorry.  I know that the Allience is merciless and ..." she 
stopped and hung her head. "I...I'm sorry." 

She then looked up at Iron Raptor with fear in her eyes. "You want 
me...to..go out there...and have them see me.....I'll be slagged!"

She was shaking at the mention of the possablility of the allience 
seeing her.  She looked down. "I want to help...but if they get thier 
claws back on me......I'm...I'm as good as slagged."  She sat down in 
the chair next to the holoprojector and shook.  She hung her head and 
dat there.   She spoke in a hushed voice,"I would go, but not alone.  
Not alone."  she still shook a bit.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked at Feline with a warm expression on her face, 
walking 
> over to her with a sigh. She placed a comforting hand on the fems 
> shoulder-plate. *
> 
> " Believe me, I feel for your dilemma. But it's alright
now. You're 
safe 
> here and if you ever need any help then just ask. But, at the 
moment, I'm 
> the one that needs YOUR help."
> 
> *Her head suddenly snapped up as she heard Prowl's comment, her 
teeth bared, 
> eyes narrowed, and on the verge of a growl. She would just let the 
little 
> comment sit and smolder for a while, then she would let him have 
it. She 
> just gave him a narrow eyes smile that spoke of revenge before 
looking back 
> towards Feline. Her expression changing back to a heartfelt look.
> Iron Raptor moved so that she was standing in the area of the floor 
that 
> Feline was looking, looking down at her.*
> 
> " I have friends. They're missing. And I need you to help
me find 
them."
> 
> * She then looked off towards the holo-projector, it then suddenly 
> activating on it's own.*
> 
> " One of those friends is Tavatron, field soldier," the
holo-
projection of 
> Tavatron appeared on the flat surface of the device in robot mode, 
her beast 
> mode projected beside her.
> " On the way back to base her signature stopped in Grid 16,
exactly 
30 
> clicks from the Alliance base."
> 
> * The projection then disappeared to be replaced by that of 
Dinobots, both 
> robot and beast mode.*
> 
> " The second is Dinobot, warrior and field strategist. His 
signature stopped 
> the same time as Tavatron's. Same location as well. I fear that
he 
might 
> have been extremely damaged from Alliance attacks and may be in 
stasis 
> lock."
> 
> * Iron Raptor then brought up the image of Tavatron as well so that 
both 
> projections could be seen, then turning towards Feline. *
> 
> " That's why I called you to me, Feline. To lead a search
and 
recovery 
> mission, for those two bots. Would you do this for me?"
> 
> * Iron Raptor's voice had a tick of worry to it, she was indeed 
worried 
> about Tavatron and Dinobot. It had been mega-cycles since she had 
seen them 
> last, wondering just what could be keeping them.
> She had located their signatures and discovered that they had 
stopped in 
> Grid 16, further research decided that those signatures weren't 
moving and 
> she wanted to know why.
> Feline was just the bot she required for such a mission, new and 
with this 
> simple mission it would be a good starter. But if she refused, then 
she 
> would run the mission herself and leave this fembot to her pass 
times.
> Iron Raptor waited for Felines answer. *
> 
>
